activity_tracker_crn.name: activity_tracker_crn
activity_tracker_crn.description: Activity tracker crn for COS bucket (Optional)

archive_days.name: archive_days
archive_days.description: Specifies the number of days when the archive rule action takes effect. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

archive_type.name: archive_type
archive_type.description: Specifies the storage class or archive type to which you want the object to transition. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

bucket_name.name: bucket_name
bucket_name.description: The name to give the newly provisioned COS bucket. Only required if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

cos_instance_name.name: cos_instance_name
cos_instance_name.description: The name to give the cloud object storage instance that will be provisioned by this module. Only required if 'create_cos_instance' is true.

cos_location.name: cos_location
cos_location.description: Location to provision the cloud object storage instance. Only used if 'create_cos_instance' is true.

cos_plan.name: cos_plan
cos_plan.description: Plan to be used for creating cloud object storage instance. Only used if 'create_cos_instance' it true.

cos_tags.name: cos_tags
cos_tags.description: Optional list of tags to be added to cloud object storage instance. Only used if 'create_cos_instance' it true.

create_cos_bucket.name: create_cos_bucket
create_cos_bucket.description: Set as true to create a new Cloud Object Storage bucket

create_cos_instance.name: create_cos_instance
create_cos_instance.description: Set as true to create a new Cloud Object Storage instance.

encryption_enabled.name: encryption_enabled
encryption_enabled.description: Set as true to use Key Protect encryption to encrypt data in COS bucket (only applicable when var.create_cos_bucket is true).

existing_cos_instance_id.name: existing_cos_instance_id
existing_cos_instance_id.description: The ID of an existing cloud object storage instance. Required if 'var.create_cos_instance' is false.

existing_key_protect_instance_guid.name: existing_key_protect_instance_guid
existing_key_protect_instance_guid.description: The GUID of the Key Protect instance in which the key specified in var.key_protect_key_crn is coming from. Required if var.create_cos_instance is true in order to create an IAM Access Policy to allow Key protect to access the newly created COS instance.

expire_days.name: expire_days
expire_days.description: Specifies the number of days when the expire rule action takes effect. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

key_protect_key_crn.name: key_protect_key_crn
key_protect_key_crn.description: CRN of the Key Protect Key to use to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket. Required if var.encryption_enabled and var.create_cos_bucket are true.

object_versioning_enabled.name: object_versioning_enabled
object_versioning_enabled.description: Enable object versioning to keep multiple versions of an object in a bucket. Cannot be used with retention rule. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

region.name: region
region.description: Region to provision COS bucket. Also used when creating Key Protect / Key Protect Keys for encryption. NOTE: If 'var.encryption_enabled' is true and an existing Key Protect instance is passed in using 'var.existing_key_protect_instance_guid', this must be the region of the existing Key Protect instance.

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The resource group ID where resources will be provisioned.

retention_default.name: retention_default
retention_default.description: Specifies default duration of time an object that can be kept unmodified for COS bucket. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

retention_enabled.name: retention_enabled
retention_enabled.description: Retention enabled for COS bucket. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

retention_maximum.name: retention_maximum
retention_maximum.description: Specifies maximum duration of time an object that can be kept unmodified for COS bucket. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

retention_minimum.name: retention_minimum
retention_minimum.description: Specifies minimum duration of time an object must be kept unmodified for COS bucket. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

retention_permanent.name: retention_permanent
retention_permanent.description: Specifies a permanent retention status either enable or disable for COS bucket. Only used if 'create_cos_bucket' is true.

service_endpoints_type.name: service_endpoints_type
service_endpoints_type.description: The type of the service endpoint that can be set for the cloud object storage instance.

sysdig_crn.name: sysdig_crn
sysdig_crn.description: Sysdig Monitoring crn for COS bucket (Optional)

cos_instance_id.name: cos_instance_id
cos_instance_id.description: The ID of the Cloud Object Storage Instance where the buckets are created

key_protect_key_crn.name: key_protect_key_crn
key_protect_key_crn.description: CRN of the Key Protect Key to use to encrypt the data in the COS Bucket. Required if var.encryption_enabled and var.create_cos_bucket are true.

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: The resource group ID where resources will be provisioned.
